OOC:  No Need To Do Anything For Me, Roland.  I Am The Most Supreme Person,=
 And Nobody Can Make Me Feel Any Different.  I Will Do As I See Fit.
  ----=
- Original Message ----- 
  From: Roland the Last Gunslinger 
  To: NBW ; d=
bzsf@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Monday, September 03, 2001 3:33 PM
  Subject:=
 Re: [dbzsf] Lurker will be back


  OOC: I wish Lurker the best. Let him k=
now that he's always welcome here no matter what. I understand if he needs =
to get away for a few days or weeks or so, too.

  Message to Lurker: MECCA=
!...

    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: 1641coburn@... 
    =
To: dbzsf@yahoogroups.com ; nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com ; DragonballRessurection=
@yahoogroups.com ; The_Untold_Chapter@yahoogroups.com ; creatureflare@yahoo=
groups.com 
    Sent: Monday, September 03, 2001 7:27 AM
    Subject: [dbzs=
f] Lurker will be back


    To Lurker's RPGs,
            This is Michael'=
s brother, but Michael's probably better known as Lurker, from what I've se=
en.  I am sending this letter to let you all know that recently, Lurker has=
 been having tough times.  His girlfriend broke up with him, whom he will n=
ever forget, and other personal matters have been happening, and he hasn't =
been the same.  This morning, I found him in his room with a knife, and he =
had threatened to kill himself, but inisisted that he loved you all too muc=
h to go.  He may come on tonight, but if not, he'll probably come on tomorr=
ow or the day after, somewhere around there.  As his brother, I ask that wh=
en he does come back, please don't be too hard on him, he has it hard enoug=
h as it is.  Lurker also said that you guys can make him feel much better. =
 

                                                                        =
                    Sincerely,    David Coburn


    P.S. Roland, Lurker wa=
nted me to pass this on to you:  "CHEESE!"


    To unsubscribe, send an e-=
mail to:
    dbzsf-unsubscribe@egroups.com



    Your use of Yahoo! Groups=
 is subject to the Yahoo! Terms of Service.
